content:
Thank you for your confirmation. Please wait while I get your station sign...
<align=center><size=30>Not this one, nope, not this either...</size></align>
Hmm? Thank you for your positive feedback.
<size=64>Next, please!</size>
Sorry for the wait. Here's your station sign. Please keep it safe.
Apply for the Planet station sign!
Alright. I've noted your feedback.

We provide services for station sign applications, new station requests, and service center expansions... Hmm? If you have any questions, please scan the code with your phone, and I'll assist you in finding the relevant services.
Could not be more satisfied
How may I help you today?
Thank you for developing a vibrant planet in the Universe. Would you like to connect to the Star Station?
Satisfied
We have received the "Planet Handbook" submitted by your coordinator. The initial development status is... <color=#8AAB4B>"Above Expectations."</color>
Once placed on a Planet, the sign will send precise coordinate signals to the Star Station.
Yes!
Just one more step in the process, please... Hey, you in the back! <size=64>NO CUTTING IN LINE!</size>

Planet Number: <color=#8AAB4B>{Player Route Code}</color>,
Planet Name: <color=#97c344>{homestar}</color>.
Hi, <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>.
<size=64>Next, please!</size>
Do I have to give a rating?
What other services do you have?
Hmm, nothing. Please rate your experience with this service...
Thank you very much for your honest feedback.
...The initial development of this Planet has, well, "barely met expectations."
Hello, and welcome to Loomi Co. This is the "Planet Division," handling all Planet-related services.
Lastly, here is the station sign installation notice from Loomi Co.: "Please maintain a safe distance and be cautious."
Got it. Please use your phone to scan and confirm the details of the Planet Station Sign.
Our service is now complete. Wishing you a successful connection and a starlit journey.
